column4: Something really odd just happened...I finished watching a TV ep and started up a new one. It came up black and white even tho it was a color video. Now, any .avi I play, no matter what player, is black and white... O_o
I've tried Totem and mplayer
so can anyone help with this?
do you have effects turned on ? turn them off
yeah...OK
compiz does not play well with video
I turned off compiz, still happening...
no idea realy, I would suggest you reinstall the gstreamer packages but I think you better do a little search in the forum
both keyboard and mouse usb ?
No, built in. It's a laptop.
look up your model here and see if there are any issues, also try in the forum   https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport
no need, the latest version is in the repos,   just open synaptic and search for webcam the pacakge is gspcaxx I beleive
ah, thank you :)
the only packages with spca/gscpa are gscpa-source and spca5xx-source (yes, I have universe enabled.)
gscpa source I guess
then I'm gonna have to compile it XD
no , it will install
and insatlling it from synaptic doesn' work ?

as I said before, installing the spca5xx source package does NOT install the driver, but rather downloads the source to /usr/src/something.tar.gz. When I try to compile that source, I get the error I pastebin'd
runing make with sudo ?
I have tried with and without sudo. Same error.
I have no idea, sorry,
